## 4.1 Example 1: basic
![Example 1: basic](img/4.1.JPG)
 

```{r}

ui <- fluidPage(
  h1("Gapminder"),
  sliderInput(inputId = "life", label = "Life expectancy",
              min = 0, max = 120,
              value = c(30, 50)),
  selectInput("continent", "Continent",
              choices = c("All", levels(gapminder$continent))),
  # downloadButton("download_data"),
  plotOutput("plot"),
  tableOutput("table")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  # filtered data
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    
    # sliderInput range
    data <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(
        lifeExp >= input$life[1],
        lifeExp <= input$life[2]
      )
   
    # selectInput choices
    if (input$continent != "All") {
      data <- data %>% 
        filter(
          continent == input$continent
        )
    }
    data
  })
  
  
  output$table <- renderTable({
    data <- filtered_data()
    data
  })
  
  # output$download_data <- downloadHandler(
  #   filename = "gapminder_data.csv",
  #   content = function(file) {
  #     data <- filtered_data()
  #     write.csv(data, file, row.names = FALSE)
  #   }
  # )
  
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    data <- filtered_data()
    ggplot(data, aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp)) +
      geom_point()
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```

## 4.2 Example 2: Layout
![Example 2](img/4.2.JPG)

![Example 2](img/4.2_.JPG)

```{r}

ui <- navbarPage(
  title = "Dashboard",
  tabPanel(
    title = "About",
    h1("Hello World"),
    p("some text ", a(href="http://www.google.co.uk", "Google"))
  ),
  tabPanel(
    title = "Gapminder Analysis",
    
    sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
        textInput("title", "Title", "GDP vs life exp"),
        numericInput("size", "Point size", 1, 1),
        checkboxInput("fit", "Add line of best fit", FALSE),
        radioButtons("colour", "Point colour",
                     choices = c("blue", "red", "green", "black")),
        selectInput("continents", "Continents",
                    choices = levels(gapminder$continent),
                    multiple = TRUE,
                    selected = "Europe"),
        # Add a slider selector for years to filter
        sliderInput("years", "Years",
                    min(gapminder$year), max(gapminder$year),
                    value = c(1977, 2002))
      ),
      mainPanel(
        plotOutput("plot")
      )
    )
  )
)

# Define the server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    # Subset the gapminder data by the chosen years
    data <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(
        continent %in% input$continents,
        year >= input$years[1],
        year <= input$years[2]
      )
    
    p <- ggplot(data, aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp)) +
      geom_point(size = input$size, col = input$colour) +
      ggtitle(input$title)
    
    if (input$fit) {
      p <- p + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
    }
    p
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    # Subset the gapminder data by the chosen years
    
    
    data <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(
        continent %in% input$continents,
        year >= input$years[1],

# Define the server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  filtered_data <- reactive({
    # Subset the gapminder data by the chosen years and continents
    
    data <- gapminder %>% 
      filter(
        continent %in% input$continents,
        year >= input$years[1],
        year <= input$years[2]
      )
    
    data
  })
  
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    data <- filtered_data()
    
    p <- ggplot(data, aes_string(input$x, input$y)) +
      geom_point(size = input$size)
    
    if (input$fit) {
      p <- p + geom_smooth(method = "lm")
    }
    p
  })
  
  output$table <- DT::renderDataTable({
    data <- filtered_data()
    data
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
